title: Hope Church
problem: HopeIsReal needed a modern website that conveyed their mission, encouraged donations, and was easy to update internally.
solution: Designed and developed a full WordPress site with ACF blocks, custom buttons in React, and performance/accessibility optimizations.
summary: Modern WordPress rebuild with ACF blocks and React-driven CTAs so HopeIsReal can inspire donors and keep content fresh.

title: Perc
problem: Perc.org needed a major redesign with better content organization, modern design, and easier content filtering.
solution: Created a full redesign with Gutenberg blocks (core + Kadence), implemented Alpine.js filtering using the WP REST API.
summary: Reimagined Perc.org with a structured Gutenberg experience and Alpine-powered filters that make research browsing effortless.

title: Buffalo Store
problem: BuffaloCorp needed a better e-commerce experience, particularly around navigation and product search.
solution: Redesigned the storefront with a jQuery-powered mega menu and custom Gutenberg blocks for a better product discovery flow.
summary: Commerce-focused redesign with jQuery mega navigation and custom Gutenberg blocks so shoppers can find the right tools faster.

title: New2SATX
problem: A new business needed guidance and execution on building their first digital presence.
solution: Guided them through site structure and layout, implemented SEO and analytics setup using Google tools.
summary: Launched the brand’s first site with guided IA, SEO, and analytics so the new business starts strong online.

title: Ascent
problem: The team wanted to experiment with Full Site Editing and TailwindCSS for future projects.
solution: Led implementation of their first FSE theme, integrating Tailwind and reusable components with custom jQuery enhancements.
summary: Built their inaugural FSE + Tailwind theme with reusable components and jQuery polish to accelerate future experiments.

title: BC Web Studio
problem: BC Web Studio needed a home for its own services that separated agency partnerships from business consulting while showcasing vetted case studies, service frameworks, and operating principles in one place.
solution: Designed and developed an Eleventy marketing site with JSON-driven case studies, Alpine.js filtering, and dedicated "For Agencies" and "For Businesses" landing pages. Built a Tailwind/PostCSS component system, reusable info cards, and media carousels powered by structured project data so updates stay fast and consistent.
summary: Created BC Web Studio’s Eleventy marketing hub with Alpine filtering and data-driven case studies tailored to agencies and businesses.

title: St. Louis Lambert International Airport
problem: Lambert Airport’s public site hadn’t kept pace with traveler expectations: flight status, TSA, parking, and concessions data lived in disconnected systems, navigation was confusing, and the previous theme couldn’t meet the stricter accessibility and multilingual requirements.
solution: Partnered with Kestrel and Dovetail to rebuild FlySTL with a WordPress theme. Wired Kadence + ACF blocks for every layout and layered Alpine.js components that talk to flight, TSA, and parking APIs. Built flight-status and search modules that hydrate from the airport feed and parking cards that query SuperParkingLot in real time. Hardened navigation with accessible mega menus, header tab panels, ReciteMe + Google Translate helpers, and skip-link/keyboard patterns. Implemented custom post types so the airport team can manage updates without engineers.
summary: Led FlySTL’s API-connected, accessible WordPress rebuild with live travel data widgets and Kadence/ACF layouts that keep passengers informed.

title: Holland
problem: Holland’s legacy marketing site looked outdated, scattered work by sector, and lacked the filtering and CMS flexibility needed for the Kestrel + Dovetail team to tell the whole story without developer help.
solution: Partnered with Kestrel and Dovetail to translate their Figma redesign into a Kadence-powered WordPress build. Delivered bespoke Gutenberg blocks, CPTs, and a filter/tab system that lets sales and marketing surface projects, services, and regions with just a few clicks.
summary: Joint agency rebuild with Kestrel and Dovetail that turned the Holland site into a Kadence + custom-block experience with CPT-driven filters and tabbed storytelling.
